newsitem.title: USA: Omniquip International files for proposed IPO.
newsitem.headline: Omniquip International files for proposed IPO.

text.p: Omniquip International Inc said Wednesday it has filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission covering a proposed initial public offering of its common stock.
Formerly known as Uniquip Corp, Omniquip manufactures telescopic material handlers and a line of loading equipment.

Omniquip said it expects that some of the shares will be sold in the United States and Canada through Morgan Stanley & Co Inc, CS First Boston Corp, Schroder Wertheim & Co Inc and Robert W. Baird & Co Inc, as underwriters.
Harbour Group Investments III LP and an affiliate currently hold about 92 percent of the company's common stock.
